item.description: The Canterbury Shaker Village will host Strawberry Jam, which will feature a variety of musicians, demonstrations of cooking, winemaking and gardening and a picnic lunch with strawberry shortcake. They will have strawberries for sale and there will be fruit and garden tours, as well as being able to tour the historic village. Admission to the village for adults is $17.00. I will be driving from Derry for anybody who wants to join me.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: The Strawberry Jam at the Canterbury Shaker Village
